topics.body:
Ok about the dress thing, and I hate to bring it up again

But I figured out the solution

The image's color balance was screwed up, and in the image the dress appears white/gold
!http://static6.businessinsider.com/image/54efd931eab8ea4e58d8fa89-639-479/white-gold-blue-black-dress.jpeg!

But the actual dress was found on Amazon, and it's black/blue
!http://d3819ii77zvwic.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/black-and-blue-or-gold-and-white-dress-amazon-review-615x342.jpg!
So in conclusion: the dress IS in fact black/blue, but the image's color balance makes it look white/gold

Both sides are technically correct here, so don't you dare try to argue anymore

Edit: goddammit this made a new page now we probably won't leave it alone
topics.author: 9ba2e84e636164642cc03200

and why do I see it everywhere[/bq]

Is magical[/bq]
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/waifu-thread/post/54614aa76368724a4ed80000#post_54614aa76368724a4ed80000
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@Too_Offensive":/dis/waifu-thread/post/5461491b63687274a9370000#post_5461491b63687274a9370000
Oh yeah, I watched that Ghost video days ago. Yes, that video is awesome.[/bq]
"@EHAN":/dis/waifu-thread/post/5461633963687278eb880000#post_5461633963687278eb880000
[bq="EHAN"]"@trashboat":/dis/waifu-thread/post/54613eff6368725c28c40100#post_54613eff6368725c28c40100
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/waifu-thread/post/5461491b63687274a9370000#post_5461491b63687274a9370000
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/waifu-thread/post/54614aa76368724a4ed80000#post_54614aa76368724a4ed80000
*I watched the video. I mean, it's beautifully made, the characters and animation look fantastic, and the song is pretty catchy too, but I don't get why people are making a huge deal out of it.*[/bq]
oh past me...

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/waifu-thread/post/5461c28a6368723887100200#post_5461c28a6368723887100200
[bq="Too_Offensive"]"@EHAN":/dis/waifu-thread/post/5461633963687278eb880000#post_5461633963687278eb880000
I dunno. I guess it just hit at the right time. Everything about it is just so appealing to me.  [/bq]
"@EHAN":/dis/waifu-thread/post/54622faa63687228ba670200#post_54622faa63687228ba670200
[bq="EHAN"]"@Too_Offensive":/dis/waifu-thread/post/5461c28a6368723887100200#post_5461c28a6368723887100200
I changed my mind after an hour, the fanbase is harmless. I've gone back to the video like four times now. It really is beautifully made.[/bq]
AND THEN

"@EHAN":/dis/waifu-thread/post/54640e8e6368727ef45e0000#post_54640e8e6368727ef45e0000
